com.mycompany.eurostat

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.eurostat.DAO

  • public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
    The DAO class is responsible for handling data connections to external API's.
    See Also:
    Data Access Object (DAO)
